mapper.insert: insert into article (article_id, cat_id, title, author, author_email, keywords, article_type, is_open, add_time, file_url, open_type, link, click, publish_time, thumb, content, description) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
